title: EE60110: Advanced Digital Signal Processing - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: (Digital Signal Processing (18615) is the prerequisite for the subject)Statistical Signal Processing: Method of least squares (LS). Recursive LS. Consistency of estimates. Observer, full and reduced order. Kalman filter. Parameter estimation. Nonparametric Estimation: Correlation and spectral analysis. Cepstrum.Yule-Walker equation. Singular Value Decomposition (SVD). Higher order statistics, triple correlation and bi-spectrum.Transform Method of Signal Processing: Haar, Hadamard and Walsh transform. Wavelet transformation, sub-band coding. Image analysis, compression. Adaptive Signal Processing: Voice band signal, signature analysis, speech identification. Voice models. Lattice structure. Echo cancellers. Equalizers. Multi-rate filters. QMF. Fuzzy Signals: Signal description. Network implementation. Neuro-fuzzy processing of signals.
